sourceMeaningMnemonic: You examine the <radical>mouth</radical> of a <radical>zombie</radical> and find a small <kanji>garden</kanji> in there. There are even benches... it looks like a <kanji>park</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Zombies are dead, so I guess their mouths have all the things garden plants crave. Their mouths are like compost piles, if you think about it.
readingMnemonic: You look closer at the <kanji>garden</kanji> and suddenly everything <reading>en</reading>ds (<ja>えん</ja>).
readingInfo: Oh. The zombie probably bit down on your head and now it's the end for you. At least you were looking at a nice garden at the end of it all...
